content: That's a great idea! Incorporating safety into your everyday routine is an excellent way to reinforce the importance of staying safe. Using games like "I Spy" is a fun way to teach your children about safety features that are essential for their well-being. It's all about making safety a part of their daily lives, and creating a culture of safety and injury prevention in your home. Keep up the great work and continue to find ways to make safety education fun and engaging for your children.
